mapper.select: select /* INDEX_DESC(tbl_chat pk_chat) */ chat_no, pjt_no, total_m_no, writer, chatcontents, to_char(regdate, 'hh24:mi') as regdate from tbl_chat where pjt_no = #{pjt_no} AND chat_no > #{chat_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_chat values( chat_no_seq.nextval, #{pjt_no}, #{total_m_no}, #{writer}, #{chatContents}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_chat_cnt set chat_cnt = (select count(chat_no) from (select * from tbl_chat where pjt_no = #{pjt_no})) where pjt_no = #{pjt_no}
mapper.select: select nvl2((select pjt_no from tbl_chat_cnt where pjt_no = #{pjt_no}),'T','F') res from dual
